roles.description: Has complete admin control over the service desk including access to account or billing related information
roles.name: Account Admin

roles.description: Can perform all non-admin actions except reporting
roles.name: IT Agent

roles.description: Can perform all agent related activities, view and create change and have full access for problem module
roles.name: Problem Manager

roles.description: Can perform all agent related activities, view and create problem release and have full access for change module
roles.name: Change Manager

roles.description: Can perform all agent related activities, view and create change and have full access for release module
roles.name: Release Manager

roles.description: Can perform all agent related activities, view problem, change, release and have full access for CMDB module
roles.name: Configuration Manager

roles.description: Can perform all agent related activities, view problem, change and have full access for Contract module
roles.name: Contract Manager

roles.description: Can perform all agent related activities, can view and manage alerts
roles.name: IT Ops Agent

roles.description: Can view, create and manage projects
roles.name: Project Manager

roles.description: Can view and work on projects
roles.name: Project Member

roles.description: Can perform all agent related activities and perform all activities on Purchase Order
roles.name: Procurement Manager

roles.description: Can work on Tickets, Projects, Solutions, and Announcements. Cannot view reports
roles.name: Business Agent

roles.description: Can work on Tickets, Projects, Solutions, and Announcements. Can view and manage reports
roles.name: Business Team Supervisor
